text: Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ ikiangsɨzim me ganɨga ghaze, Gɨn gumazamiziba ua danganir kam, Tofet o Hinomɨn danganir zarim a darɨghan kogham. Apaniba dughiar kamɨn Judan gumazamizir avɨribav sueghtɨ, me arɨmighiram. Eghtɨ Tofetɨn danganim, a Judabar matmatiar danganimɨn mɨn ikɨtɨ, men kuaba bar a gizɨvaghtɨ, men kuaba afamin danganiba ua puvatɨgham. Eghtɨ me danganir kam kamagh a dɨponam, Danganir Gumazibav Sozi Me Ariaghirim.
